WorkItem.Description:
I'm also developing on Windows, but most open-source projects use LF-only line endings. Would be nice if RateIt did the same.

While repackaging the latest version for Meteor, my build process converted rateit.css to UNIX line endings, which results in this misleading GitHub diff: https://github.com/dandv/meteor-jquery-rateit/commit/c83897aabbddf990430c3515a69336853cf175c5

Comments.Message: I will change it for the next release.

Resolved with changeset 36409: When using SELECT box backingfield one can now override the min value (not take it from the backingfield)

Saved everything with Unix LF line ending.
